title: Idor in Example Corp
description: Discovered Insecure Direct Object Reference on API affecting Example Corp. The application does not properly sanitize user input, allowing an attacker to inject malicious payloads that are executed by the application.
impact: An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to access or modify resources belonging to other users.
reproduction_steps: Observe that the payload is executed
proof_of_concept:

Payload: See steps

This demonstrates Insecure Direct Object Reference on API

# Validation at 2025-11-05T21:50:33.739248
Validation successful with alternative payload at 2025-11-05T21:50:33.739246
remediation: Implement proper authorization checks for all object access. Use indirect references or verify ownership before allowing access to resources.
